name: SurfaceBasedSmoothing
description: Surface-based smoothing applied to ImageToSmooth using a geodesic neighbourhood defined by sigma and the surface image.
author: ANTs Developers

inputs.name: Image to Smooth
inputs.description: The image that needs to be smoothed.

inputs.name: Surface Image
inputs.description: Assumes a label == 1 that defines the surface.

inputs.name: Output Name
inputs.description: The name of the output file.

inputs.name: Number of Repeats
inputs.description: Number of times the geodesic neighborhood is applied repeatedly.
